verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, If a woman <S%H802><s%> have conceived seed <S%H2232><s%>, and born <S%H3205><s%> a man child <S%H2145><s%>: then she shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>; according to the days <S%H3117><s%> of the separation <S%H5079><s%> for her infirmity <S%H1738><s%> shall she be unclean <S%H2930><s%>.
And in the eighth <S%H8066><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of his foreskin <S%H6190><s%> shall be circumcised <S%H4135><s%>.

And she shall then continue <S%H3427><s%> in the blood <S%H1818><s%> of her purifying <S%H2893><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>; she shall touch <S%H5060><s%> no hallowed <S%H6944><s%> thing, nor come <S%H935><s%> into the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>, until the days <S%H3117><s%> <S%H3117><s%> of her purifying <S%H2892><s%> be fulfilled <S%H4390><s%>.

But if she bear <S%H3205><s%> a maid child <S%H5347><s%>, then she shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> two weeks <S%H7620><s%>, as in her separation <S%H5079><s%>: and she shall continue <S%H3427><s%> in the blood <S%H1818><s%> of her purifying <S%H2893><s%> threescore <S%H8346><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.

And when the days <S%H3117><s%> of her purifying <S%H2892><s%> are fulfilled <S%H4390><s%>, for a son <S%H1121><s%>, or for a daughter <S%H1323><s%>, she shall bring <S%H935><s%> a lamb <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> for a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, and a young <S%H1121><s%> pigeon <S%H3123><s%>, or a turtledove <S%H8449><s%>, for a sin offering <S%H2403><s%>, unto the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, unto the priest <S%H3548><s%>:

Who shall offer <S%H7126><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for her; and she shall be cleansed <S%H2891><s%> from the issue <S%H4726><s%> of her blood <S%H1818><s%>. This is the law <S%H8451><s%> for her that hath born <S%H3205><s%> a male <S%H2145><s%> or a female <S%H5347><s%>.

And if she be not able to bring <S%H4672><s%> <S%H1767><s%> <S%H3027><s%> a lamb <S%H7716><s%>, then she shall bring <S%H3947><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> turtles <S%H8449><s%>, or two young <S%H1121><s%> pigeons <S%H3123><s%>; the one <S%H259><s%> for the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, and the other <S%H259><s%> for a sin offering <S%H2403><s%>: and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for her, and she shall be clean <S%H2891><s%>.
